messages.message: A bug in the flow app toast message  - run a flow step, after it finishes running click on `View output here` in the toast message, it always take you to the output of the last step of the flow (instead of the step that you chose to run).
FYI @Karthik S is this happening now that we automatically run the step using the Flow Binary backend?
It should take it to the output of the flow step. Lemme fix it if its not the case
I see. Run step code is executed now using the existing run_flow code. Let me look at this
Could you send over the exact steps you have Kerry to reproduce?
I have a fair idea to repro this
I think I know why this is happening. Lemme get back with a fix.

https://www.instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/pre-built/us-markets/bank-statements/flows-blend/other.ibflow
Click on the three dots next to `Process Files` and choose `Run`. Wait for it to finish. Click on`View output here` in toast message. It takes you to `s4_merge_files/` and you’ll see the `out.ibocr`
Oooh. I did some refactoring here to fix Flow Run. I'm not sure if it's pushed to prod but would be good to check the JS code as well @Karthik S if I created an issue there
This is happening because we are returning the final output dir instead of the step's output directory for flow v1
